io.geeny.prettyprint.model

Class TextElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.geeny.prettyprint.model.TextElement

  • public class TextElement
extends java.lang.Object
    Model Object for a text element for pretty print
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marco Bierbach and Klemen Samsa

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextElement(java.lang.String _text)
      Constructor for an element which has no color at all.

      Constructor for an element which has colored background
      TextElement(java.lang.String _text, PrettyPrintConst.COLOR _color)
      Constructor for an element which has colored text
      TextElement(java.lang.String _text, PrettyPrintConst.COLOR _color, PrettyPrintConst.BACKGROUND _background)
      Constructor for an element which has colored background and text
